events.title: Yomari Punhi Festival
events.description: Celebrate the sweet Newar festival by making, sharing, or finding yomari around Patan. Complete related quests to earn bonus rewards and cultural badges.
events.fomoText: Limited-time festival — share your yomari before it melts away!

events.title: Festival of Lights
events.description: Patan glows bright for three nights! Capture the illuminated courtyards and join community lantern walks for double XP rewards.
events.fomoText: Only three nights to light up your profile!

events.title: Rato Machhindranath Jatra
events.description: The grand chariot procession moves through Patan’s streets. Track the chariot, complete festival challenges, and capture the spirit of devotion.
events.fomoText: Catch the chariot before it moves on!

events.title: The Hidden Shrine
events.description: A secret ceremony is whispered about behind Mahaboudha. Discover the hidden shrine to earn legendary rewards.
events.fomoText: Shh... something ancient waits to be found.

events.title: The Ancient Path
events.description: A three-chapter mystery unravels across Lalitpur. Complete each part to reveal the truth about Yala’s forgotten guardian.
events.fomoText: Limited time — uncover the legend before it fades away!
